short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Never be late for another google meet! Meeting will call you to join.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
⏰ Meetings reminders that work!
Never Miss Another Meeting Again. Let Your Meetings Call You! Works with Google Meets.

Running late to yet another Google Meet? 🤔 Why are you calling into your meetings when they could be calling you?

This extension takes care of it. Before your next meeting, a pop-up (and optional alarm 🔔) will remind you. Snooze it, join right away, or ignore it – your call.

✨ Key Features:
- 🛎️ Instant pop-up reminders for your Google Meets
- 🔄 Automatically updates with your latest meetings
- 💤 Option to snooze until the meeting starts
- 🔇 Mute the sound if alarms aren't your thing
- 🚫 Skip reminders for meetings you’ve declined

Now, you'll never be "that person" who's late – unless you really want to be. 😎
